description:
12 Hours of Content, 449 Pages of Course Slides, 950 PMP® Quiz Questions Included IN the course. This is simply the BEST and MOST complete PMP® Preparation Course Available on Udemy.

This course is administered by Innate Images, LLC an official PMI® REP (Registered Education Provider) and enables you to claim 35 Contact Hours or PDUs for PMP® re-certification (changing in Dec 2015 - hurry up and earn those PDUs soon!). In fact our course has so many quiz questions and such in-depth content, that this course qualified for an EXTRA 10 Contact Hours or PDUs - so you get 45 instead of just the standard 35.

Why fly somewhere, stay in a hotel, take a week off from work, sit in a classroom and incur all the costs associated with such a trip…

When you can prepare for the PMP® Exam AND earn 45 PDUs from the comfort and convenience of your own personal surroundings. Accessing exactly what you need to pass the PMP® exam has never been so easy.

Our Course is designed by a BetterPM Assistant Instructor who has over 10 years of experience leading actual projects at major corporations across the US and a professional educational course designer who specializes in distance learning.

BetterPM's streaming video, audio and printed material “hits the mark" on “exactly" what you'll need to pass your exam. We do this by leveraging our years of experience with thousands of students…

We know what the “most challenging areas" of the test are, so we highlight and emphasize those areas for you as you go through the training, making it the most time leveraged and efficient process possible.

Our Course has been downloaded over 100,000 times online at our other sites, it has been tried and tested by many people over the last 5 years! Come and take the best!
title: PMP® Preparation - REP Approved 35 Contact Hours
